topic.title: Germany background information
topic.shortdesc: Some important information about Germany, including the time difference, weather, map, and currency information.

body.p: Time: Germany is seven hours ahead of Minnesota. For example, if it's 1:00 p.m. in Minnesota, it will be 8:00 p.m. in Germany.

Weather: Germany's weather is moderate and has generally no longer periods of cold or hot weather. Northwestern and coastal Germany has warm summers and mild cloudy winters. Farther inland, the climate has greater seasonal variations with warm summers and cold winters.
Currency: Germany's currency is the Euro. Currently, 1 U.S. dollar equals 0.94 Euro.
